messages.content: Must be a tough life when all you can think about is sad stories to keep you from enjoying anything.
Well 216 is out now and Im crying. [NAME] why?
It’s a cruel thing to say to someone with depression.
I never understood the part where he dives into a pile of money, even as a child. It seems wildly painful.
If you have schools in your city, I got bad news for ya champ...
No, what’s sad is saying the same message like it’s news. He’s a copy paste machine. No original thought.
Oh man that hurt to watch
The fact you have to explain this at the third grade level is pathetic. People think somone preventing his own murder is a tragedy.
Sadly enough I was thinking the same.
It's real enough sadly. Kin have been around for awhile in their own corners of the net.
Still is glitched to this day.... sad
It was a painful cringe, too. Are we masochists?
I saw that comment and wondered if someone was going to post it here. I almost feel bad. Maybe they’re lonely.
This happens to me all the time I’m so sorry 😣 it’s always with burgers, too. So painful.
What a horrible way to find out, though. My sympathies to the dead man.
This is scary and so very sad. Eleven??? A baby! I was still building forts. I weep for this child.
Help me [NAME] I'm bully in high school for no reason.
sadly it would take wayyyyyy more than this to ever change custody agreements. documenting it for her own sanity is a good idea, though.
Holy bait-and-switch, [NAME]. I’m so sorry, that has to be incredibly stressful to have to be around and deal with.
